name: [ENG] For you, Mo Ran
description:
• FOREWORD:

Our beloved Mo Ran's birthday is coming and April also marks 1 year anniversary of the day I joined this fandom. Because I have nothing to do during quarantine anyway, I want to make a game to celebrate our beloved husky's birthday. This is a gift for him, as well as for all the lovely friends I've made in this fandom.

  • SYNOPSIS:  

Mo Ran's birthday is coming. What has Chu Wanning prepared for him?

Shorter synopsis: Ranwan's peaceful days on Nan Ping mountain.

For those who has never read 2ha but wanna play it anyway: Ancient Chinese gay couple being lovey dovey.

  • WARNING (PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE DOWNLOADING)
  1.  This is a fan game of the novel "The husky and his white cat shizun" by Meatbun doesn't eat meat. Everything that happens inside the game is all fan fiction, therefore, not canon.
  2. This game is free, ad less, and doesn't bring back any commercial benefit to the game designer. 
  3. The writer's first language is not English so there maybe some hick-up here and there but it's readable. 
  4. Characters belong to the author. If there's any OOC-ness, please forgives me.
  5. The game's setting is 3 years after canon so there will be spoilers for the last chapters and the extras. There's no major spoilers for the story line, though.
  6. This game is 18+ and is quite NSFW.  Please don't play it in public.
  7. Music credit is in the MUSIC CREDIT.txt file under the download section.
  8.  Please rt my post and share the game links, I'll be posting the cheat codes once the rt count reaches the milestones lol
  9. 1 week after the game's release, I'll be posting the complete game guide. 
  10. Feel free to share screenshot and do LP of the game (DM me at @tokihey if you're not feeling shy, I'd love it)
  11. There are a total of 9 endings: 7 normal endings and 2 hidden crack endings. Try getting them all.
  • BEGGING CORNER

The game may seem short but it was made with love and took a lot of effort and time. Please drop a comments here or over at twitter (@tokihey) to motivate me hahaha

If you like this game, check out my other games at this page

There's another 2ha game I've made, check it out here
